title: How to Enjoy Mikans?
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Kanata-saaan! I’m here~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You-chan, come on in~! Wow, that’s a lot of mikans!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>They’re souvenirs! Hey, a few days ago, Chika-chan made grilled mikans~ Wanna try that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oh, that’d be delicious~ Mikans become even sweeter when you cook them~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh? Kanata-san, you’ve heard about grilled mikans before?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I’ve cooked mikans while making sweets with them before~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oh! I thought you wouldn’t know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe, don’t sweat it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Is there a mikan preparation method you haven’t tried before?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm...... You know the frozen mikans they sell on the Shinkansen trains? I’ve been craving them. They’d be super tasty and fun to share at a kotatsu...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I wanna have ice cream at a kotatsu. Let’s do that, then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Okay~ Why don’t we have the sweets I just finished making while we wait for these mikans to freeze?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
